issue.title: Explicitly limit the number of current running segway jobs.

content.raw: The 360 is an estimate from a calculation that seems to be inaccurate. An hour is a short time to wait in a batch queuing system. People should not expect there will be idle machines waiting for their jobs at any time (except for in debug queues).
content.html: The 360 is an estimate from a calculation that seems to be inaccurate. An hour is a short time to wait in a batch queuing system. People should not expect there will be idle machines waiting for their jobs at any time (except for in debug queues).
